title: Legal and Regulatory Requirements for AI Supply Chain
description: Organizations establish processes to ensure AI system procurement and development comply with applicable legal frameworks for supply chain security

title: AI System Supply Chain Context
description: Organizations map and document AI system supply chain dependencies including third-party models, datasets, and infrastructure components

title: Third-Party AI Risk Management
description: Accountability structures established for managing risks from third-party AI system providers and supply chain partners

title: AI Supply Chain Risk Identification
description: Organizations identify and document potential risks from AI model poisoning, data tampering, and supply chain compromises

title: AI Supply Chain Monitoring
description: Continuous monitoring mechanisms implemented to detect anomalies in AI system behavior that may indicate supply chain compromise
